summary: A comprehensive sorting and display mod. Based on ulcf999's  original, Better Sorting Mod. Items will now sort\display in a logical and consistent manner, providing a less tedious experience while greatly enhancing inventory management and display. Over 4700 records renamed including vanilla Armors. Compatible with USLEEP-WaFR.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][/u][/center][center][/center][center][font=Times New Roman][color=#00ffff][i][b][size=6]Another Sorting Mod-2018[/size]
[u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32145/?][size=2]Original ASM Mod here[/size][/url][/u][/b][/i][/color][/font]
[size=3]A comprehensive and Up-to-Date Sorting and Display Mod

Records Managed and Sorted by ASM-2018 - 4744 (v9.6)
ASM-2018+ (452) 

[/size][size=3][b]Another Sorting Mod 2017 updates ulcf999s  excellent, [i]Another Sorting Mod[/i]. Most items will now sort properly[/b][/size]
[size=3][b][i]and thus provides a less tedious experience while enhancing inventory management. [/i][/b][/size]
[i][size=3][b]Updated for the latest USLEEP 3.0.10+ as well as updated patches for many popular, or not-so-popular mods.[/b]
[b] This version is a complete replacement and does not require the original mod, or any of its files.[/b]

[color=#ffff00][b]Note: This will be the last major update for ASM-2018 for Skyrim Classic(9.6). SSE is now mature enough to no longer warrant the time and effort of maintaining two slightly different versions of the same mod for two versions of Skyrim.  ASM (classic) will not be receiving any more updates. ASM SSE however, continues being actively updated and improved. See you there![/b][/color][/size][/i][/center][center]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]ASM-2018[b][i] *REQUIRES*[/i][/b] USLEEP, All DLC and Cutting Room Floor[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=6][u][i]Features[/i][/u][/size][/color]

[b]<Ammunition>  [/b]Sorts arrows and bolts (Arrow - Xxxx, Bolt - Xxxx)

Note: Ammo power in ASM(Core) is based on [b]Vanilla[/b] values.
For [b]Weapons and Armor Fixes[/b] , use  ASM Core and ASM-2018 Plus

Ever thought it was a little unrealistic how you can carry infinite arrows , bolts and spears around Skyrim?
For Ammo immersion, try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37816/?]Weighted Arrows[/url] by [b]Joubarbe. Set to .1 weight.[/b]

[b]<Armor>[/b] Sorting for [b][color=#00ff00]ALL[/color][/b] vanilla+DLC armors-robes-some clothes-jewelry.
An all-new and improved naming system replaces vanillas awkward, and disjointed naming conventions.

[b]<Books> [/b] Totally overhauled naming for the majority of books, notes, letters, orders and recipes you can find in world.
(Some Notes are Letters now and vice versa). Former Quest and skill Books optional now integrated into main file. 

[b]<Crafting> [/b] Ores, Ingots, Gems etc. Ore - Ebony, Ingot - Steel,
[b]
<Dragon Priest Mask Sorting>[/b] Dragon Mask - Xxxx
[b]
<Food> [/b] Foods are sorted by type> (Mammoth - Raw, Salmon - Steak etc) 

[b]<Ingredients> [/b](Mountain Flower -Xxx, Egg - Chicken, Fish - Xxxx

[b]<Miscellaneous> [/b]Clutter\Misc items sorting has been greatly improved over vanilla. Most misc items now group together in your lists.

[b]<Potions> [/b] Sorted by Class, strength (Fortify Illusion II, Restore Health V etc).
Player-made *potions are always sort to the top of inventory ie *Fortify Stamina 
Poison Potions sorted separately > [Poison] xxxx
Features realistic potion weights. 

[b] <Soul Gems> [/b]Numerically sorted and by state, Full\Empty. ie Soul Gem I (petty) Soul Gem V (Grand) etc. 
[b]
[/b] [b]<Spells>[/b]  Sorted by Archetype AND Rank - Fire: [ I  ] Bolt , Armor [ V ] Dragonhide 
Bonus: The two light spells got a small tweak...

[b]<Weapons>[/b]  ASM offers limited weapons sorting. The most prominent are, Staffs and Crossbows. 

All spells, scrolls,vendor tomes, recipes and staffs descriptions use ASM's common format.

[b]<Categorization> -[/b] ASM also attempts to re-categorize some items ie, some notes are no longer categorized as books, skulls categorized as clutter etc.

[b]Realistic weights. Most weights are based on Skyrim.exe and also latest USLEEP changes where applicable. Weights are a combination of Vanilla, USLEEP, Realistic and some derived from CCF. Does NOT replace CCF, but is compatible with it. Pelts are heavy, ore and ingots are heavy, scrolls are light(0.1), potions have scaled weights. Weights are a hybrid of Vanilla, WaFR, C&CF and ASM-2017. [/b]

[b][i][color=#ffff00][size=3]Current Patches for selected Mods.
Support for new or existing, or even old mods do get added from time to time,
 so check back for updates or new additions.[/size][/color][/i][/b]

Aether Suite v3.x.x (Off-Nexus)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]Amidianborn Content-Addon[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84946/?]Beyond Skyrim - Bruma[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76729/?]Blue Fire Magic[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35399/?]Book Covers Skyrim-Legendary[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69306/?]Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21922/?]Dawnguard Explosive bolts visualized[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54679/?]
Ducks and Swans[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69474/?]Elemental Destruction Magic
[/url]Elemental Staffs (Custom Plug-in)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?]Faction Crossbows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?]Falskaar 1.21
[/url]Immersive Armors and Weapons(Combo patch)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?]KD Circlets Redone[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52248/?]Legacy of the Dragonborn[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66105/?]Morrowloot Ultimate
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65317/?]Nock to Tip[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]Perkus Maximus[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18799/?]Radiant and Unique Potions V2 (Glow)[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78785/?]Realistic Needs and Diseases v2.0[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?]Skyrim Immersive Creatures
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1040/?]The Art of Magicka[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24684/?]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83736/?]Ultimate Assortment[/url]
   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade [/url](Use 2017+)
  Wyrmstooth 1.17 (Off-Nexus)

 [size=4]Installation:
[/size]Install with NMM or manually. Install any compatibility patches required.
[color=#00ff00]>Bash Patch users. Make sure ASM-2018 has /names/stat tag enabled before making your patch<[/color]
[size=3]
   LOAD ORDER MATTERS!  [/size]

[i][size=3]As with any other sorting mod, ASM will "conflict" with most overhaul mods that deal with potions, crafting materials, spells, Clutter, books and so on. Nothing can be done about this, except to experiment (OR use a supported patch if available). ASM integrates with, and is fully compatible with WaFR, CCF, CCoR.  Always place ASM-2018 below CCF, WAF, CCoR.[/size]
[size=3]For best results, always sort your load order by hand rather than LOOT.
[/size][b]Bash Tags /names /stats.[/b]

[size=3]Partial List of specific and general Mods categories that are made redundant, obsolete, or conflict with ASM-2017[/size]
[size=3]where no patch file is provided (not 100% exhaustive) [/size]
[size=2]
[b]Original Another Sorting mod  2013[/b]
[b]Better Skill and Quest Books Names (redundant-conflicts)[/b]
[b]Anything by Headbomb (obsolete)[/b]
[b]Anything with 'ASM' in it, ASM knockoffs, etc.(redundant-conflicts-obsolete)[/b]
[b]Any other 'sorting' type' mod(conflict-redundant-likely obsolete)[/b]
[b]Immersive Jewelry (conflicts)[/b]
[b]Spell overhauls-varies. Spell overhauls that use vanilla forms(conflicts), custom forms\ID's (no conflict)[/b]
[b]Book\Scroll overhauls (conflict) [/b]
[b]Alchemy\cooking overhauls (conflicts) ASM supports CACO.[/b]

[b]In cases of:[/b]
[b] conflicts - adjust load order accordingly to have desired mod 'win' conflict. Or install patch if available [/b]
[b]redundant or obsolete - indicates mod is not needed, its features are present in ASM-2018[/b][/size]

[size=3]ASM-2017 uses no scripts, consumes no resources, and cannot damage your save game.[/size]
[/i][i][i]
[size=4][u][color=#00ff00]FAQ[/color][/u]

[/size][color=#00ff00][b]Q: How does ASM-2018 coverage compare to the original ASM? [/b]
[b]A: Aside from a enormous amount of updating and format overhauls to the original mod, ASM-2018 sorts more records. Over 3x more records than ASM-2013. 4700+ (v9.6) vs 1512 (v1.5.1.3). While ASM-2017 core framework is derived from the original ASM, ASM-2018 is its own, standalone mod, with new ESPs and totally rebuilt patches.[/b]

[b]Q: Does ASM-2018 only change names?[/b]
[b]A: No, despite its name, ASM-2018 covers more than just names. Weight and Base Costs have also been modified in some instances. This is reflected in its broad compatibility with CCoR, WaFR, C&CF. Other edits are done to correct inconsistencies in records USLEEP has not, or won't fix, ie potion pricing errors, or books with incorrect attributes. Some weights have been adjusted to be more realistic on certain items. Scrolls are now weigh .1, rather than vanillas .5. The majority of records are straight vanilla renames, but many items have had values adjusted for realism, gameplay, and immersion where appropriate.[/b]
[/color][size=2][color=#00ff00]
Q: Does ASM-2018 Require Clothing and Clutter fixes, WaFR?
A: No, but ASM-2016 is fully compatible with those mods on its own and will function w/o, but is designed to work with them.
They are recommended mods.
2018+ requires WaFR CCoR, C&CF

Q: Is ammo strength changed in ASM-2018?
A: No, ASM-2017 uses vanilla\USLEEP values. ASM 2017 Plus file applies WaFR changes.

Q: What is {P} that appears on some items for?
A: Items tagged with a {P} indicate permanent\persistent items. They will remain in the world no matter what, unless sold to a vendor.
 Any items known to posses this hidden permanency flag have been tagged.

Q: Most items are sorted, but I find the odd one(s) that are not. Is ASM broken?
A: No, you have a conflicting mod (or bash patch is not up-to-date), or a load order issue, that is overwriting the entries in question.
If you use and ASM supported mod, be sure to install the compatibility file for it.
See Load order matters!

Q: Any plans for a weightless, or reduced weight version?
A: No. ASM-2017 is a singular solution with a heavy emphasis on realism and immersion.
This is why it has been made compatible with Clothing and Clutter fixes. Making  heavy and bulky items, ie ingots, pelts, Dwemer scrap etc, weigh little or nothing in world is not a goal of ASM-2018

Q: Can I  merge your optional compatible files for my load order?
A: Yes, If you run many of the supported mods I highly recommend merging as many as you can. In most cases, merging optionals into one file should work w/o any issues.
Some of the compatibility files are REPLACEMENT ESP's and wont increase  your ESP count.
YMMV of course. I don't offer specific support for custom optional merges.
Be sure to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69905/?]Merge Plugins 2.2.3+[/url] by Mator, and NOT Xedits built in merge script. [/color][/size]

[size=3]My other mods[/size][/i][i][size=3]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72626/?]Bijin All-In-One-2016[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36760/?]Katria Follower-'Katrina' and RaceMenu Preset
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73684/?]OmAdriana-2016[/url]
[/b][/size][/i][/i][size=3][b][i][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73861/?]Opulent Outfits-Mage Robes of Winterhold-2016[/url][/i] 
[/i][i][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73054/?]Proudspire Manor Dragonborn Edition-2016[/url]
[/i][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72729/?]Shani Black Armor for UNP-2016
[/url][/i][/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76676/?]Skysight - Simply Bigger Tree Billboards Lod-2016[/url][/b][i][color=#ffff00]

Like my Renaming work? I've done Renaming work for the following mods,
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65146/?]JEDI-SITH ARMORED CLOTHES v1.4[/url] -update
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78862/?]Battlemage Armour (Female) by [b]Elianora[/b][/url][b] -alt esp
[/b]Check out these fine mods and thanks to both them for featuring my work.

[/color][/i][/size][/center]
author: Mebantiza

files.name: ASM-Elemental Staves
files.changelogHtml:
Reworked the format of the spell line. Not dramactically, but they display a bit cleaner now.
Categories affected
-Spells
-Scrolls
-Books
-Recipes
-Staffs.
Other
Fixed up a few assorted entries where needed. Reworked the crossbows.

files.name: Another Sorting Mod-2017 (Core)
files.changelogHtml:
Added

Craft - to: Pelts Hides Leathers + Linen in Misc. Having these grouped together is far better than having them in 3 seperate sub-groups scattered in misc. This does to pelts and hides what the recent change to /alcohol did for ingestibles.

2017 Plus updated to match

Updated: Notes.

files.name: Another Sorting Mod-2017 Plus
files.changelogHtml:
Added

Craft - to: Pelts Hides Leathers + Linen in Misc. Having these grouped together is far better than having them in 3 seperate sub-groups scattered in misc. This does to pelts and hides what the recent change to /alcohol did for ingestibles.

2017 Plus updated to match

Updated: Notes.

files.name: Another Sorting Mod-2018 Plus
files.changelogHtml:
-Reversion: Removed all Book - Xxxxx changes. All these entries, will revert back to vanilla sorting.
-Updated a couple of books\notes.
-Fixed a scroll typo.
-Made a slight improvement to the BYOH listings (3).

Note: This will likely be the last major update for ASM-2017(2018 really), for Skyrim Classic. SSE is now mature enough to no longer warrant the time and effort of maintaining two slightly different versions of the same mod for two versions of Skyrim. ASM plus, pretty much ALL the optionals, and now the main file, are all up-to-date. ASM-2018 for skyrim classic, is pretty much where is needs to be and I don't think I can do much more with it. Barraing USLEEP type updates, or fixing egregious errors, which there shouldn't be any at this point, 9.6 will not see any more changes or additions.
